description:
The president of the http://anidb.net/ch132088 [Benerit Group], and supervising representative of the auditing organization Cathedra. With his stern and cool-headed attitude, he leads a multitude of affiliate companies. He also shows cruel severity to his daughter http://anidb.net/ch124445 [Miorine].
Source: Official page
name: Delling Rembran
